subject: Horse Racing
Doping (Sports)
Breeders' Cup (Horse Races)
Kentucky Derby
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: Doug O’Neill, the trainer of the 2012 Kentucky Derby winner, I’ll Have Another, will not be allowed to enter horses in this year’s Breeders’ Cup after being suspended by the New York State Gaming Commission in connection with a positive drug test last year on one of his horses at Belmont Park.
